Articles.Content:
Kohman Pack for KopernicusTech v1

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Here is the long waited download: http://www./download/4ir2pinnc8s27m9/Kohman_Pack.zip

What this pack adds is a binary brown dwarf system orbiting a miniature black hole.It is 2 billion km away.

It adds 3 celestial bodies:

- Kohman (black hole)

- L0V (brown dwarf, larger of the two)

- L5V (brown dwarf, smaller of the two)

Currently i'm testing planets but are very buggy and unstable for release.

But never take my word seriously when it comes to releases.

BUGS AND PROBLEMS:

- L5V is partially inacessible (i think) because L0V's SOI overlaps it by a significant amount.

I tried getting into orbit around L5V with HyperEdit, it's impossible basically.

FUTURE PLANS:

- Probably these brown dwarves will be orbiting a star, but unsure.

- Planets. A LOT of them.

- Biomes (if i only knew how)...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Status: Why am i even doing the status?

Edited April 29, 2015 by Candlelight

Just a bit more tweaks and more planets and it's here.

And BTW, it's gonna use flightsglobalindex from 20 - 40(of course if someone didn't take them).

Will release it in less than an hour from now.

Word of the wise, don't start your threads when you have nothing to show. People will come in here, see nothing and will subconciously leave with a negative opinion of the mod. Best is to just wait until you have a download, screenshots or at the very least a detailed description of the mod ready.

- - - Updated - - -

I'll give ya 20-49 instead.

Ok, then i have more space to work with.

Word of the wise, don't start your threads when you have nothing to show. People will come in here, see nothing and will subconciously leave with a negative opinion of the mod. Best is to just wait until you have a download, screenshots or at the very least a detailed description of the mod ready.

Agreed
It's been over an hour.
This better not be a disappointment if I'm waiting this long XD
Prime example of why you don't start threads until you have something to show.
Dude, seriously... im waiting... Why u gotta tease like dat?

Seriously yesterday was really tidious so i didn't have enough time.

Main reason why my release threads are empty at first is because, just like you, i have responsabilities in real life too so it makes it really stressing for me to do tons homework and bring mods and such to you guys.As i said, DONT take my word when it comes to releases.

So to everyone that is feeling disappointed, i really have to say, i'm sorry.

So from this day on, i'm not posting anymore empty, useless threads!

Edited February 18, 2015 by Candlelight

You should probably make a cloud pack that makes the night side glow like so (little ball in first image):

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Well, truly, i don't know how to do that.

I just know the basics, such as editing the Kopernicus config, editing with kittopia and that sort of stuff.

Well, truly, i don't know how to do that.

I just know the basics, such as editing the Kopernicus config, editing with kittopia and that sort of stuff.

Create a cloud layer with colors:

R = 100,

G = 0,

B = 0,

A = 100

and you should have it glowing bright as day.

Create a cloud layer with colors:

R = 100,

G = 0,

B = 0,

A = 100

and you should have it glowing bright as day.

Thanks! This code is for E.V.E. right?

Yes.

Also you probably can use starfix on your brown dwarfs, and I would recommend that too.

any update .3. I had a hard enough time getting basic rocketry TT.n.TT but now that I have it I'm going to TRY to put something on a different body... I DID get something into orbit, atleast I did that TwT
